resources.string: Skinner is an Ai diseases Diagnostic System that helps to diagnose diseases, especially skin diseases, the application aims to help and possibly save the lives of millions through early diagnosis of the disease and Help the medical staff by ensuring the correctness of their diagnoses to patients.

Melanoma
Psoriasis
Skin burns
Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
Herpes Zoster
Skin Cancer
Vitiligo
Eczema
ScabiesBasal Cell Carcinoma
Melanocytic Nevi
Benign Keratosis-like Lesions
Tinea-Ringworm-Versicolor
Leprosy
Melasma
Ichthyosis Vulgaris
Varicose veins
Frostbite
Freckles
Chickenpox
the diseases that are covered in the application until now
